main event: A round metallic grey object was observed at high altitude near Boston, Massachusetts for 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was unable to show details and seemed to be almost stationary at high altitude,The sighting was classified as assumed to be a balloon by the intelligence officer,The object was seen at an estimated altitude of 39,000 feet or above,The sighting was reported by a duty pilot,The location was about twenty miles north-northeast of Boston.
